description: This Java class 'PathValues' acts as a container for various directory and package configuration values used during code generation for a service, API, event, and native components. It encapsulates paths and package names derived from a provided ICPragma object, facilitating structured code generation workflows within the project.

classes.name: PathValues
classes.description: A helper class to store and access directory and package configurations for code generation sessions, based on ICPragma configurations.

methods.name: PathValues
methods.description: Constructor that initializes PathValues with an ICPragma object.

methods.name: getServiceDir
methods.description: Returns the base directory for generated service code.

methods.name: getServicePackage
methods.description: Returns the package name for generated service code.

methods.name: getApiDir
methods.description: Returns the base directory for generated API code.

methods.name: getApiPackage
methods.description: Returns the package name for generated API code.

methods.name: getEventDir
methods.description: Returns the directory for generated event code.

methods.name: getEventPackage
methods.description: Returns the package name for generated event code.

methods.name: getNativeApiHeaderDir
methods.description: Returns the directory for generating native POJO, Event, Enum, and IPC header files.

methods.name: getNativeApiSrcDir
methods.description: Returns the directory for generating native POJO, Event, and Enum source files.

methods.name: isNativeApiDirsDefined
methods.description: Checks if native API directories are defined (non-empty).

methods.name: getNativeIpcHandlerDir
methods.description: Returns the directory used for generating native IPC message handler source files.

methods.name: getNativeIncludes
methods.description: Returns an optional list of include directives for native code.

methods.name: getNativeFreeforms
methods.description: Returns an optional list of additional strings for native code.

methods.name: getNativeConfigFlag
methods.description: Returns the configuration flag for native IPC.

methods.name: getJavaFreeforms
methods.description: Returns an optional list of additional strings for Java code.
